articles.author: Andrew Freedman
articles.title: Arctic blast tied to polar vortex puts U.S., Europe in deep freeze - Axios
articles.description: The cold air is already on the move into the U.S., with snow and ice soon to follow.
articles.content:
An Arctic outbreak featuring punishing cold weather is beginning across much of the U.S. at the same time that Europe prepares for plunging temperatures.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Eastern Europe fumes as Zelensky pulls plug on Russian gas transit to Europe via Ukraine - Fortune
articles.description: Eastern Europe braces for energy fallout as Ukraine halts Russian gas transit, marking a major shift in Europe’s energy landscape.
